title: Coronation Street spoilers: Trailer reveals prison riot for David, as Daniel cheats on Sinead with Bethany
text:
Coronation Street have dropped a brand new trailer for its upcoming dramatic week — and it’s seemingly a week that will change everything — as David Platt (Jack P Shepherd) finds himself caught up in a shocking prison riot, while Sinead Tinker (Katie McGlynn) makes the most of her final few weeks, as husband Daniel Osbourne (Rob Mallard) struggles to cope — and finds himself in the arms of Bethany Platt (Lucy Fallon).

Yes, it’s all kicking off as a prison riot gets underway, and David finds himself caught in the middle. We know that the young lad is set to come face-to-face with his rapist, Josh (Ryan Clayton), and that — during the upcoming riot — he’ll be given the opportunity to seek revenge, but whether or not he does so remains to be seen. However, if the trailer is anything to go by, matters soon get heated.

As the riot unfolds, the trailer previews a shocked Shona (Julia Goulding) receiving a phone call from David, who proceeds to tell her that things have just ‘went too far’. What has he done?

ON NEXT WEEK'S UNMISSABLE CORONATION STREET!! Sinead says a final farewell to her loved ones, Daniel seeks comfort and David finds himself caught up in a prison riot alongside rapist Josh…#Corrie pic.twitter.com/Z0ctMj8aTh — Coronation Street (@itvcorrie) October 14, 2019

Meanwhile, emotions are high on the Street, as Sinead’s final few days are upon her. Kirk (Andrew Whyment), Beth (Lisa George), Craig (Colson Smith) and Ken (William Roache) make the most of out of what little time she’s got left — but tensions between Sinead and Daniel reach boiling point, as the young woman orders her husband out of the house.

Heartbroken, Daniel seemingly finds comfort with Bethany.

However, with the two having had noticeable chemistry in the past, will Daniel cheat on Sinead?
